Class VirtualPlayer

java.lang.Object
base.Player
player.VirtualPlayer
public class VirtualPlayer extends Player
Represents an AI-controlled player in the JEST game. Virtual players make automatic decisions using AI strategies.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hazri and Sophea
